column1: Kata Robata////I usually order squid at a sushi restaurant to determine how fresh their seafood is that usually translates into how well sushi and their sashimi is.  Unfortunately
column2: Kata Robata has NEVER had squid available for all the times I've visited the restaurant.  I have even joked around with the staff about removing it from the menu.  It's a bit disappointing that they never have it in their inventory.
